briefTitle: A Randomized Cluster Trial to Evaluate a Mobile Mammography Unit in Breast Cancer Screening in France (Mammobile)
officialTitle: Evaluation of a Mobile Mammography Unit. A Randomized Cluster Trial Protocol of a Population Health Intervention Research to Reduce Breast Cancer Screening Disparities in Normandy, France (Mammobile)
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Aggregated breast cancer screening participation rate 3 months after the last invitation
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* women eligible to breast cancer screening campaign : aged 50 to 74 years, and with the only risk of breast cancer being age. The previous screening mammography dating from 22 months

Exclusion Criteria:

* outside the ages
* with specific risk of breast cancer
